page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: Many parents work.Food therefore has to be prepared quickly.Microwave cookers cut cooking time down.Much of the food is frozen and kept in freezers until needed.Families eat together around a table perhaps only three or four times a week because of busy lifestyles.Around this area very low incidence of unemployment.Majority of homes have colour television,video recorders,stereo system and one or two cars per family.Families very safety concious_having house insurance to protect against fire and theft.There are not many open fires_now most popular fire a gas fire.Majority of homes have central heating.Average home has a pet,eg.dog,cat,bird etc.
